name: The Laser Zombies
description:
A 9-year-old girl was turned loose on Unreal Engine to see what she could come up with in a game jam, and this is the result. There is a world with three buildings, each of which have laser zombies in them that will try to kill you. Hold click to fire your plasma rifle to kill the zombies, use the mouse to aim and look around. Victory comes from finding and killing all of the laser zombies. Failure comes if they eat you with their laser teeth.

The level was built entirely by a 9 year old girl.

Coding for the player and monsters was done by ShakaUVM

The Plasma Rifle model was made by Mike Srun

The Victory/Loss Screen by Stephanie Dahlin
